original: If you want to make an omelette, you have to break some eggs! Mistakes happen.
translated: 舍不得孩子套不着狼！失误也是在所难免的。

original: Please bear in mind we are still shooting in the dark.
translated: 请记住，目前我们还在黑暗中摸索。

original: Splashing around in the gene pool, so to speak.
translated: 可以说是在基因池中泼水。

original: If you're not 100% satisfied with your baby, take the brat out back and blow its sub-standard brains out or return by Alpha Mail and we will put them to work around the facility.
translated: 如果你对孩子不够满意，可以把它闷倒，再砸烂它的次品脑子，或是通过阿尔法邮政退回，交给我们为研究设施工作。
